member.name: M:Spire.Xls.Conversion.PropertyMap.CopyFrom``2(``0,``1)
member.summary: Reset all properties indicated by PropertyMapAttribute of object dest, using the value of the corresponding property in src

member.name: M:Spire.Xls.Conversion.PropertyMap.InheritFrom``2(``0,``1)
member.summary: Init all properties indicated by PropertyMapAttribute of object dest, using the value of the corresponding property in src. If the property has already value, doesn't reset it.

member.name: M:Spire.Xls.Conversion.PropertyMap.CopyFrom``2(``0,``1,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Copy all properties indicated by PropertyMapAttribute of object dest, using the value of the corresponding property in src
member.param: Indicates whether overwirtes the property which has value.

member.name: P:Spire.Xls.Converter.PdfConverterSettings.FitSheetToOnePage
member.summary: Indicate whether fit the entire sheet to one page

member.name: P:Spire.Xls.Converter.PdfConverterSettings.EnableExcelPageBreak
member.summary: Indicate whether use excel page setup. If true, split worksheet by the page breaks in the sheet. If false, split worksheet by the PDF page size.

member.name: P:Spire.Xls.Converter.PdfConverterSettings.IsUsingExcelPageSetup
member.summary: Indicate whether use excel page setup

member.name: T:Spire.Xls.Converter.FitToPageType
member.summary: Options of resize worksheet to fit PDF page.

member.name: F:Spire.Xls.Converter.FitToPageType.None
member.summary: Does not resize the worksheet, split it by the PDF page size.

member.name: F:Spire.Xls.Converter.FitToPageType.NoScale
member.summary: Keeps the original size of the worksheet, even if it is large than the PDF page size.

member.name: F:Spire.Xls.Converter.FitToPageType.ScaleWithSameFactor
member.summary: If there is one or more worksheets large than the PDF page, resize all worksheet with the same factor to fit PDF page.

member.name: F:Spire.Xls.Converter.FitToPageType.ScaleWidthDifferentFactor
member.summary: If there is one worksheet large than the PDF page, resize it to fit PDF page.
